author: hroskes
body:
Backport of #18749

Restructuring of the All In One validation tool

* Use the common track selection and refitting sequence
  * For offline validation and track splitting
  * Explicitly checked that process.dumpPython() is essentially unchanged from how it was before
* Extend the mechanism to create latex slides:
  * works for track splitting validation in addition to offline
  * include a summary table of important track quantities
  * more general mechanism to extend to other validations (but leave that for the next iteration)
* Several options that were useful for phase 1 startup
  * option to disable pixel quality flag, proxy forwarding, ...
* Large rearrangement of code to reduce duplication
title: All In One tool update
